bibl.title: New Fragments of Book 1 of Sappho.
bibl.note: P. GC. [P. Coll. privées: P. Green] Inv. 105. Green Collection, Oklahoma City. Four fragments assembled from some twenty separate pieces recovered from cartonnage. The handwriting is identical to that of P. Sapph. Obbink [P. Coll. privées; ed.: Dirk Obbink, Two New Poems by Sappho, ZPE 189 (2014) pp. 32-49, 1 pl.]. Late second century through the first half of third century AD. - Order and Numbering of Fragments. - Textual Overview: Sappho 9 Voigt; - Sappho 16-16a; - Sappho 17; - Sappho 18 and 18a; - Sappho 5. - [Text.] - Palaeographical notes. - Commentary.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Coll. privées: P. Green Inv. 105
Simon Burris, Jeffrey Fish & Dirk Obbink, New Fragments of Book 1 of Sappho.

P. GC. [P. Coll. privées: P. Green] Inv. 105. Green Collection, Oklahoma City. Four fragments assembled from some twenty separate pieces recovered from cartonnage. The handwriting is identical to that of P. Sapph. Obbink [P. Coll. privées; ed.: Dirk Obbink, Two New Poems by Sappho, ZPE 189 (2014) pp. 32-49, 1 pl.]. Late second century through the first half of third century AD. - Order and Numbering of Fragments. - Textual Overview: Sappho 9 Voigt; - Sappho 16-16a; - Sappho 17; - Sappho 18 and 18a; - Sappho 5. - [Text.] - Palaeographical notes. - Commentary.
